Name: Beholder Shock II
Desc:
Reinforces the Beholder shock, allowing you to use more powerful attacks.
Required Skill: Lv. 10 Beholder Shock or higher
Lv. 20 effect: Can learn the 4th Job Skill, Beholder's Revenge

H.Old:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with 90% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
H.New:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with a 90% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec. on hit.
Cooldown: 12 sec.

h1.Old:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with 90% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
h1.New:
The Beholder moves in front of you and attacks up to 10 enemies at 215% Damage 6 times, with a 90% chance of Stunning them for 5 sec. on hit.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
